author: Ryan Stevens
comment: I paid for this app, I have to unplug the receiver to reset in order for this app to work.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us with more information about your setup. info@myav.co.uk

author: Eric Tuthill
comment: Great app and the best customer service I've ever seen.  Love it!

author: Kyle S
comment: Great app and works with TV, BD and SKY Q. I had to manually add in my TV, Sony Bravia 50", and it worked with the Bravia 2015 4K profile. The front-end could do with a huge overhaul, looks like it's been put together in Android studio in 10 min. If you're charging this much for the app, hire a designer on contract.

author: mufassar ali
comment: works perfectly with my virgin v6 boxes and at the same time control my TV with same app 5*

author: Philip Grice
comment: Fast forward and rewind for Sky Q has suddenly stopped working!!! Other than this the app is amazing and works perfectly...great alternative to a remote control

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Thanks for letting us know about this, we've just published an update that should hopefully fix the issue.

author: peter jupp
comment: Been using this app for 2 years quite happily. Upgraded my TiVo to Virgin's V6 box today, had to manually set the IP address, but once done send to be working fine.

author: Caleb Vincent
comment: Your app no longer works on my sky Q please help!!!!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please powering off your SkyQ at the power socket as the network software in it can sometimes lock up

author: Adam Stamos
comment: This is the best AV app I've used and has worked great for all my cable boxes and Onkyo receivers up to the RZ-900. Unfortunately I just sold the RZ-900 and picked up the Denon AVR-X4300H which this doesn't seem to be compatible with. Hopefully they will update the app soon so I can start using it again. Once that happens I'll give it another star.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: We think we've found the issue why MyAV is not connecting with the AVR-X4300H and the latest update corrects this.

author: Bill Kaufman
comment: Remote worked great for years. After update it will not stay connected to avr. I must close and restart app just to turn volume up and down. Really sucks.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk and we will help you with this problem. We're here to help.

author: Amy Southard
comment: Thank you for the update!!!  Picked up my Sony Blu-Ray player again like it used too!!!  Lost the remote long ago, so this is a must have!  Thanks!

author: Mike S Smith
comment: Works alright, needed a remote for my harman kardon avr 347 and it works good and with my other devices except my Sony stereo. Anyway you could add support for a bookshelf stereo?

author: Martin Bove
comment: Using pixel and pixel c app doesn't work. Works once then fails for TV and TiVo Virgin media box. Fresh install required to get it to work. Support offered up closing app and re starting it. Like the app, useless

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
We've just released a beta update that should fix this issue.
You can download it here 
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.pocketwood.myav

author: HG Mills
comment: Good functioning, easy to set up and use. Support is very good and very responsive via email. Definitely one of the better remote apps here.

author: Debby Wren
comment: Was working fantastically,  but my cable box broke so had an new one installed and now it won't pick up the new box and I can't find any info to help me fix this issue have tried uninstalling and 'reinstalling but still not working

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
We've just released a beta update that should fix this issue.
You can download it here 
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.pocketwood.myav

author: Jeffrey Brooks
comment: Just keeps getting better from world c!ass developers

author: Ray Smith
comment: Works great with Sky & Roku. Detects my Bush TV with correct IP  and shows channels and app menus but no controls work, odd thing is there is a Google store app for Bush internet TV's that works perfectly so I'd love to use myav for everything and not have to switch just for TV. The model number is DVB-T-C LED40127FHDCNTD

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Thanks for the good review. We'd like to get MyAV working with your Bush TV, could you please email us info@myav.co.uk as we need some more information?

comment: This app used to work about when I first bought it. Now it doesn't. It keeps on asking for a code that is supposed to appear on the tv screen. The code does not appear on the tv screen. Therefore the app no longer works

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Can you please email us  info@myav.co.uk so we can resolve your problem. Please tell us which makes and models of devices that you have.

title: Doesn't work

author: Graham Balfour
comment: The app was brilliant that why I paid for the full app, until the update now it won't pick up my sky + hd box in my living room on the one upstairs in the bed room

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Can you please email us info@myav.co.uk so we can resolve your problem.
Sometimes the Sky+HD box can become overwhelmed with commands requiring a reboot at the power socket. Then restart MyAV by pressing the android return/back button twice.

title: The app worked great before update

author: Chewie Dog
comment: Use too. Now, it constantly force closes.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please could you email us info@myav.co.uk for support.

title: Doesn't Work.

author: Ashleigh Crumplin
comment: Had the pro app for months to use for now tv since its been updated i now cant use the feature for nowtv and its stuck on sky. Past couple of days the app now doesn't work full stop.. contacted the email help support without any reply.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: We have replied to your email, please can you contact us again  info@myav.co.uk.

title: Now not working

author: Maryanne Connolly
comment: This IS a great app...when it works!!!! Paid for an app that only opens half the time!! Can take me 45 mins to get it to load on my screen, then works for a few times then does it again!! So frustrating!!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk for support.

title: Would be great if it worked all the time

author: kenny meechan
comment: Was great when it worked hence payed for the PRO version. Now only let's me change to the 4 channels that there are icons for at the bottom of the screen. BBC 1 & 2, ITV and channel 4. Edit - using it for Sky+HD. GREAT. SEEMED TO SORT IT. thanks

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Glad you got it working again. Sometimes the Sky+HD box's network software can become overloaded with too many requests (rapid button presses). We are working on a way to limit them.

title: Was working then not. Reset seemed to have fixed it

author: Paul Lecca
comment: Works well .every now and then u may have to reboot sky box plus app but once in a blue moon ,help from programed good and  what they say works so all in all good app well played guys and girls

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Thanks for the good review.  It seems like the box can be "overwhelmed" with commands and locks. This normally only happens with rapid button presses. We are working on a solution to stop this from happening.

title: Perfect

author: Barry Flynn
comment: Was working great on sky and tivo now will not work on tivo which is y I bought pro can something be done

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk for support.

title: Barry

author: Chase vu
comment: Just doesnt aerve for what i have. No xfinity

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Xfinity X1 is now supported via IP in the latest update. It can't currently be auto detected. but you can manually add your account to MyAV using the settings menu>"Manually add IP based device".

author: Popsie Daily
comment: Works great !!!
title: Love it

author: Mandy Jackson
comment: Worked great then paid for it and stopped working now,am not uninstalling to reinstall and have to pay again-please sort this and then will change rating

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Sorry that you are experiencing issues, you don't have to pay again if you uninstall and reinstall as Google Play remembers your purchase (as long as you are logged in with the same account).
Please can you contact support info@myav.co.uk listing what equipment you have (makes and models)

author: michael j
comment: With latest update sound control gone and cannot switch between  sky &. TV.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Sorry that you are experiencing issues.
Please can you contact support info@myav.co.uk listing what equipment you have (makes and models)

title: Paid for initially worked well, now

author: sam french
comment: Bought the app and it worked for a week and now its stopped!!😠😠

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk for support with more information about the equipment that you have.

comment: this is the besteht app for controlling your AV . also the support is fast, friendly and helpful

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email support info@myav.co.uk

title: awesome app and great support

author: Leif Olson
comment: It can control an amazing number of devices. 7 for me in 3 different rooms. But, configuring those devices for the proper room and then selecting which one to use later can be very cumbersome. Please provide a way to select devices from the settings screen. It would make it so much easier to use.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Thanks for the good review. We do intend to add a better way to select which devices should appear in which room profile soon.

title: Many devices, weak configuration.

author: Clara Adams
comment: I cannot fault this app. I bought it to control my Sky boxes from other rooms. It does what Sky's own app does, which is almost nothing ...... This does everything!
title: Superb app

author: paul snee
comment: I've had this app for over a year and it's worked great. Tested on experia z3, galaxy s3, LG g3, samsung note 4.

author: Adrian Broughton
comment: I bought a new blu ray player BDH6500. It seems not to be on this Apps list. I hope soon for a an update.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Unfortunately the BDH6500 doesn't have IP control built in (as far as we know), it can only be controlled via IR with MyAV.

title: New Samsung blu ray

author: Kurt Toolsie
comment: Awesome. I never use the remote that came with my 4200W anymore.

author: Harvey Brookes
comment: Works on sgs5 and Galaxy tab 4 (wifi only as no ir on tab) great at home. Even better when travelling. Always get to control the tv :-) and sometimes other things when the remote is not around for it....
title: Works well for me. ..

author: Kane Passey
comment: Trail version worked brought it now it stops working after 3secs so cant use it

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Sorry that you are having problems, please can you email support info@myav.co.uk listing the equipment (makes and model numbers) that you are using and exactly what is happening and we will fix the issue.

title: Dont buy

author: Vincente Burgos
comment: Work  good  when  free  after I pay  for  it  doesn't  work  at all

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Sorry that you are having problems, please can you email support info@myav.co.uk listing the equipment (makes and model numbers) that you are using and exactly what is happening and we will fix the issue.

author: Sarah Hinchey
comment: Once zone 2 is on tuner I can't switch it to any other input. Pretty annoying after paying for this app. I have to use the original stereo remote or a different app to change it. I have tried uninstalling and reinstall and still the same thing. Support has fixed the issue. Thanks!!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk for support with more information like the make and model of receiver you have.  Have you tried pressing the back (android) button or the home button in MyAV to exit the tuner controls?

author: Raymond Barreto
comment: Spot on support, my device (LG G2) was not compatible as an ir blaster as it was an older model but the dev still made every effort to improve this app and correct the problem even after her had issued a refund. Good guy dev.
title: Good remote, even better customer support
